messages.title: THE WRIGHT CHOICE FOR SOUTHPORT
messages.content: We need an MP who will stand up for Southport. John Pugh and Ronnie Fearn were our MPs, we knew that Southport had a strong voice at Westminster and worked hard for our town.

messages.title: SAVE OUR NHS
messages.content: The NHS must be protected from Trump. Lib Dem MP candidate, John Wright, has expressed his horror at suggestions that the NHS could be used as a negotiating chip in trade talks with Donald Trump.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: John will campaign hard on the issues that matter to local people - reviving our town centre.
John will campaign hard on the issues that matter to local people - safeguarding our hospital.
John will campaign hard on the issues that matter to local people - getting better public services.
John Wright is against using the NHS as a negotiating chip in trade talks with the US and is committed to keeping it out of deals that would not benefit the service.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems and Tories Neck and Neck - The Lib Dems are predicted to gain Southport from the Conservatives by just 119 votes!

issues.health: Lib Dem MP candidate, John Wright, has expressed his horror at suggestions that the NHS could be used as a negotiating chip in trade talks with Donald Trump.
issues.socialWelfare: We will also reform the social care system so that no-one will sell their home to pay for care.

leaflet.personalStatement: We all need help from time to time and an MP should be there for all residents.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The projection was made by the well respected election experts at Electoral Calculus.
